boardgame.description: Colossal Arena/Titan: This is a strategic card game for 2 to 5 players: you play, not as combatants, but as spectators, cheering and betting on the melee ongoing in a fantasy arena/colosseum in which fantasy creatures are pitted against each other in battle!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round one of the creatures will die. To decide which unlucky soul will be the victim, players put numbered power cards in front of the creatures, with the lowest one going to the graveyard. The jockeying for position and strategic diplomacy in playing the numbered power cards can be intense - but what makes this game even more interesting is that the players' place bets throughout the game which will sometimes allow them to use a creature's special power in battle!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The winner at the end of the game is the bettor who's raked in the most winnings - just another day in the life of a fantasy monster gambler._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Titan: The Arena is actually a reworking of a Reiner Knizia game called Grand National Derby, but The Avalon Hill Game Co's remake was quite significant from a gameplay standpoint._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Titan: The Arena printing is often confused with its namesake, Titan. But other than the fact that they both use fantasy creatures as a general theme, there is very little that is similar between the two._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented by: Galaxy: The Dark Ages_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG KN10) COLLOSAL ARENA Reiner Knizia_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Colossal Arena is a reprint of the classic Titan: The Arena, published by the Avalon Hill game company. Colossal Arena features gorgeous new art and four brand new creatures (that were not included in the original version) making Colossal Arena a new and unique game experience. In this game of gladitorial mayhem, eight monsters battle in the arena for your amusement, while crazed spectators leap into the fray to help their favorites. In this exciting game, players place bets on the fantasy creatures they think will triumph. But beware, each creature is bestowed with individual skills, and you must cleverly manage the spectator cards while guiding your bets to maximum payoff. Tension is high as one creature is eliminated every round. Will your favorite prevail? Or will your champion be destroyed and your fortunes lost. 3-5 players, 1 hour.
Great game, cards always sleeved, components in mint condition.

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGKN10) Colossal Arena is a game of titanic battles and high stakes for 2-5 players. Designed by the legendary Reiner Knizia, this Silver Line classic is a new version of Titan: the Arena originally published by Avalon Hill. This new edition of Colossal Arena features updated components and a new, more portable format.
